channel.title: PI prices
channel.description:
I've adjust the prices of a lot of items in prices lately.
The prices all work fine, but the problem is when you click "value" of an item it tells you it costs more than what it actually does.
When you buy, it buys for the price I set it to in prices, but for some reason it always says it's going to be more than what is actually is. The higher priced the item is, the more than the item's price it says it actually is.. So for like rune scimmy it says it's 29k when it's actually 23k and 3rd age plate (50m) says it's 57m.. Very strange, I thought.
It doesn't only do this to the items of which prices I've adjusted, but all items. Has anyone else noticed this on PI base? Is there a fix?

There is no such thing as prices.java
